Snares the target and grants other targets Glowing.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.glow_trap.flavor: Snares the target and grants other targets Glowing.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.ffff.flavorText: Creates a fire that quickly freezes to ice.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.gootastics_telek: The squid's Lovecraftian roots appear to make it immune.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.potent_toxin.fla: Poisons that target and causes them to take additional damage from all sources.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.the_shadows_temp: Creates a temporary tunnel of blocks.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.vault.flavorText: Sometimes you just need to get over that wall.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.rune_of_renewing: Cures status effects and grants regeneration.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.knocked_out_of_o: Summons orbiting projectiles that will launch nearby enemies.
opotato.arsnouveau.tome.takeoff.flavorTe: Launches the caster into the air and grants temporary elytra flight!
opotato.cataclysm.incinerator.desc: Full charge takes %d seconds, and if you stop holding right click after this
opotato.epicfight.wrong_forge_version: Warn throwed by Opotato: You are using a out-dated forge version! Epic Fight are incompatible with any Forge version except for 36.2.39!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.betterfpsd: Warn throwed by Opotato: Better Fps - Render Distance is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove betterfpsdist!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.immersive_: Warn throwed by Opotato: Immersive Portals is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Immersive Portals!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.chunkanima: Warn throwed by Opotato: Chunk Animator is not compatible with Rubidium, pls remove Chunk Animator!
opotato.incompatible.rubidium.betterbiom: Warn throwed by Opotato: Better Biome Blend is not compatible with Rubidium which will cause a negative optimization, pls remove BBB!
opotato.mcdoom.without_fix: Warn throwed by Opotato: You install MCDoom but don't install MCDoom Hotfixes, game will crash when rendering the Dread Knight!
opotato.incompatible.magnesium.rubidium: Warn throwed by Opotato: Magnesium and Rubidium are unofficial ports of Sodium and they are not compatible, pls remove Magnesium!
opotato.magnesium: Magnesium detected! SomeoneElseWasTaken has stopped updating it, the compatibility of open-source mods are improved with the update time, if you want to get better rendering optimization, pls try Rubidium!
opotato.helium.dangerous: Warn thrown by Opotato: Helium has been discontinued and is severely outdated, with poor compatibility. It is not recommended to continue using it. If you are looking for better memory optimization, please try FerriteCore.
